name: Willowbrooke
description: The game takes place in a high fantasy setting, in a kingdom called Willowbrooke. The kingdom is ruled by King Leopold the Third.  Mages of the kingdom are often on call to help the working class as public workers. As mandated by King Leo. So when a local wizard refuses to open the doors to her tower at the request of some merchants who have broken down on the roadside and blocked the trail, it’s up to Ash to figure out a way to get inside and get to the bottom of the problem.
